snippet: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, controlled by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and Gov. Chris Christie, appears to be wracked by politics.
abstract: Email correspondence between Port Authority of New York and New Jersey officials during George Washington Bridge lane closings reveals agency consumed by politics and beholden to whims of two rival governors
lead_paragraph: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, controlled by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and Gov. Chris Christie, appears to be wracked by politics.

headline.main: Lane Closings Scandal Shows Port Authority’s Status as 2 Warring Fiefs
headline.print_headline: Lane Closings Scandal Shows Agency’s Status As Two Warring Fiefs

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
